comments:
20041214
J9 VM

If I have some java editors open and then delete all of my projects I get a 
bunch of editors with no content left over.

STEPS
1) Open some java editors
2) Delete all of your projects

Trying to close them manually resulted in the following for a .properties

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2004-12-14 13:09:30.151
